messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 04/07/2001 10:17:59 PM !!!First Boot!!!,
ninacs@... writes:


So with that in mind, I just look
aware when we're out in public, and my fears are settled, because I know
that I don't look like a good target.

Nina



Maybe it's like being mugged.  The muggers know who to pick on.

Nance

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1100
messages.msgSnippet: This might help... from what I was told, would be abductors look for easy targets... parents who appear to not be keeping an eye on their kids. I was told (and
messages.messageBody:
This might help... from what I was told, would be abductors look for easy
targets... parents who appear to not be keeping an eye on their kids. I was
told (and admittedly, not by anyone with a degree or a job in this sort of
thing) that if a parent watches their children when out, keeps them close,
and, for example, constantly checks on their whereabouts at a park (or other
open public place) they will go elsewhere. So with that in mind, I just look
aware when we're out in public, and my fears are settled, because I know
that I don't look like a good target.

Nina
